description:
As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon’s star seed, the Light of Hope finally reveals itself. Turning into a sword, the Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia, who is now fully consumed by Chaos...
Source: hulu

titles.title: El amor de Bunny. La Luz de la Luna de Galaxia se ilumina.
Sailor Moon e il trionfo delle stelle
Usagi no Ai! Gekkou Ginga o Terasu
Usagi`s Love: The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy
うさぎの愛! 月光銀河を照らす
